statements: SELECT * FROM security_incident_reports;
SELECT incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incident_reports WHERE device_id = 100;
SELECT incident_description FROM security_incident_reports WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT reporter_name, reporter_contact_info FROM security_incident_reports WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT id, incident_type FROM security_incident_reports WHERE reporter_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incident_reports WHERE reporter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM security_incident_reports WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT reporter_name, reporter_contact_info FROM security_incident_reports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, incident_description FROM security_incident_reports WHERE device_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM security_incident_reports WHERE incident_description LIKE '%security%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM incident_reports WHERE reported_by = 'John Smith' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices WHERE owner_name = 'Alice Johnson' LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_type, last_connection FROM iot_devices WHERE last_connection > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, reported_by FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_type = 'Software Bug';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_type = 'Theft'
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_description FROM incident_reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports GROUP BY reported_by HAVING total_reports > 1
SELECT device_name, location, device_type FROM iot_devices WHERE last_connection > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY last_connection ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT i.device_id, i.incident_type, d.owner_name FROM incident_reports i INNER JOIN iot_devices d ON i.device_id = d.device_id
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM IncidentReports WHERE reported_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT device_name, location, last_reported_at FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'Sensor';
SELECT incident_id, response_team, response_strategy FROM IncidentResponsePlan;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE last_reported_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports ORDER BY reported_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT description, reported_at FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_type = 'Fire' ORDER BY reported_at ASC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE last_reported_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location, last_reported_at DESC;
SELECT incident_id, reported_by FROM IncidentReports WHERE reported_by LIKE '%John%' AND incident_type IN ('Fire', 'Theft') ORDER BY incident_id;
SELECT plan_id, response_team, planned_completion_at FROM IncidentResponsePlan ORDER BY planned_completion_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM incident_reports;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM devices WHERE device_type='Mobile';
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM device_data ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, response_type, response_description FROM incident_reports JOIN incident_response ON incident_reports.incident_id = incident_response.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_type = 'Fire'
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT device_name, data_type, data_value FROM devices JOIN device_data ON devices.device_id = device_data.device_id
SELECT * FROM incident_reports JOIN incident_response ON incident_reports.incident_id = incident_response.incident_id
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT id, incident_type, incident_date FROM incident_reports WHERE severity_level = 3;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM incident_reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM incident_response_teams;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_type, severity_level FROM incident_reports WHERE severity_level > 3;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices WHERE active = TRUE AND device_type = 'Sensor';

SELECT device_logs.log_timestamp, device_logs.log_message, iot_devices.device_name FROM device_logs JOIN iot_devices ON device_logs.device_id = iot_devices.device_id WHERE device_logs.log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_email FROM incident_response_teams ORDER BY team_name;
